reviews.name: user 1
reviews.text: By the time I met Dr. Tom, I was in the grips of my addiction, and believed there was no other way for me to live. I had lost all sense of direction, and Dr. Tom helped me uncover many layers of my emotional pain to help me get a new perspective on my life.
